about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'A Modest and Sexy Housewife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

A Modest and Sexy Housewife

HEROINE:
Hitomi Narimiya
A sexy housewife who loves to read porn novels is feeling really frustrated.

SYNOPSIS (A Modest and Sexy Housewife)


A young man comes over to her house while her husband is on a business trip.
Hitomi gazes at his young body as he exits the bath.
They eat dinner together.
She purposely leaves the door of the bathroom open to try to get him to peek at her taking a bath as well.
She listens to his stories of mountain climbing and her mind feels rejuvenated.
Although he had planned to go home after climbing the next day, he ends up staying at her house another night.
She services him with a massage, giving him a boner, which leads to a powerful banging.
His young body can keep cumming until the next morning and he crazily has sex with her all night.
Although they initially vow not to have sex anymore, he always stays over at her house when her husband is away on business and they break their own rule even more passionately each time.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
Contains content that constitutes incest.
This is a work of fiction.
